data.content:
Zed: The Master of Shadows

Release Date: November 13, 2012

Zed is a highly skilled and deadly assassin in the popular online multiplayer game, League of Legends. With his mastery over shadows and lightning-fast reflexes, he strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. Zed's story is one of revenge, power, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness.

The Story of Zed

Zed was once a young and ambitious student at the Kinkou Order, an ancient organization dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony in the world. Under the guidance of the wise and revered master, Shen, Zed trained diligently to become a skilled ninja. However, his hunger for power and impatience led him down a dark path.

Driven by his desire to surpass his master, Zed delved into forbidden techniques, discovering the forbidden art of shadow manipulation. Consumed by his newfound power, he turned against the Kinkou Order, slaying his former master and stealing the Order's sacred weapon, the Shadow Scroll.

Now an outcast, Zed formed his own order, the Order of the Shadow, and sought to expand his influence and control over the land of Valoran. With his mastery over shadows, Zed became a formidable force, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies and leaving a trail of destruction in his wake.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Zed's greatest strength lies in his ability to swiftly eliminate his targets with his deadly combination of shadow manipulation and martial arts. His passive ability, Contempt for the Weak, allows him to deal bonus damage to enemies below a certain health threshold, making him a formidable finisher.

One of Zed's signature abilities is his Living Shadow, which allows him to create a shadow clone that mimics his abilities. This ability not only provides him with increased mobility but also allows for complex and unpredictable plays. By utilizing his shadows effectively, Zed can confuse and outmaneuver his opponents, making him a nightmare to face in one-on-one duels.

However, Zed's power comes at a cost. His abilities consume energy, limiting his sustained damage output compared to mana-based champions. Additionally, Zed is a high-risk, high-reward champion, as his all-in playstyle leaves him vulnerable if he fails to secure a kill. Proper timing and decision-making are crucial for Zed players to maximize their effectiveness.

Zed's Place in the Game

Zed is a popular pick among players who enjoy high-mobility assassins and flashy plays. His unique playstyle and skill ceiling make him a favorite among experienced players looking to showcase their mechanical prowess. Zed's ability to quickly burst down squishy targets and escape with his shadows makes him a potent threat in the mid-lane and even in the top-lane as a counterpick.

Furthermore, Zed's presence in the game extends beyond his gameplay. He has become an iconic figure in the League of Legends lore, representing the eternal struggle between light and darkness. His rivalry with Shen, his former master, adds depth and intrigue to the game's narrative, captivating players and immersing them in the world of Valoran.

On the dedicated page for Zed on our website, players can access detailed information about his abilities, playstyle tips, and strategies. Additionally, they can explore and watch videos showcasing all of Zed's available skins, allowing them to customize their champion's appearance to their liking.

Whether you seek the thrill of outplaying your opponents with lightning-fast reflexes or are drawn to the captivating story of a fallen ninja seeking redemption, Zed offers a unique and exhilarating experience in the world of League of Legends.

Zed (Worlds 2016 Zed)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 1, 2016

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions and their unique skins. One of the most popular champions in the game is Zed, the Master of Shadows. Zed is a high-risk, high-reward assassin who excels at swiftly eliminating his targets. With his deadly abilities and shadow manipulation, Zed has become a fan-favorite among players. To celebrate the 2016 League of Legends World Championship, Riot Games released a special skin for Zed called

The Worlds 2016 Zed skin is a visually stunning and thematically fitting addition to Zed's collection. This skin transforms Zed into a fearsome warrior adorned in the colors and symbols of the World Championship. The skin features a sleek black and gold color scheme, with intricate details that highlight Zed's mastery of shadows. The design of the skin perfectly captures the essence of the World Championship, making it a must-have for Zed enthusiasts and fans of the tournament alike.

One of the standout features of the Worlds 2016 Zed skin is the unique recall animation. When Zed recalls, he is enveloped in a swirling vortex of energy, reminiscent of the World Championship logo. This animation adds an extra layer of flair to the skin and showcases the attention to detail that Riot Games puts into their skins.

In addition to the recall animation, the Worlds 2016 Zed skin also includes new visual effects for Zed's abilities. The shadows created by Zed's abilities are now adorned with the World Championship logo, further emphasizing the connection between Zed and the prestigious tournament. These visual effects add a level of excitement and immersion to the gameplay experience, making the skin feel even more special.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zed, originally known as Shen's apprentice, was consumed by his desire for power and knowledge. He delved into forbidden techniques, ultimately leading to a confrontation with Shen. In the ensuing battle, Zed killed his master and took control of the Order of Shadows, a secret organization that wields the power of darkness.

Zed's story is one of redemption and revenge. He seeks to prove himself as the true master of shadows and to avenge his fallen master. Zed's abilities reflect his mastery of shadows, allowing him to teleport through dimensions, create clones, and unleash devastating attacks. His playstyle requires precision and quick thinking, as he relies on his shadows to outmaneuver his opponents and strike with deadly precision.

In the game, Zed is primarily played in the mid lane as an assassin. His high burst damage and mobility make him a formidable threat to squishy targets. Zed excels at picking off isolated enemies and quickly eliminating them before they have a chance to react. However, Zed is also a high-risk champion, as he is vulnerable to crowd control and relies heavily on his abilities to deal damage. Players must carefully manage their energy and cooldowns to maximize Zed's effectiveness.

Overall, Zed is a complex and rewarding champion to master. His unique playstyle and visually striking abilities make him a favorite among players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward gameplay. Whether you're a fan of Zed's lore, his gameplay, or simply his cool appearance, the Worlds 2016 Zed skin is a fantastic addition to your collection.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Zed's appearances, including the Worlds 2016 Zed skin. Explore the different skins and discover the many ways you can unleash Zed's shadowy power on the Rift.

Zed (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Zed, the Master of Shadows, is one of the most iconic and feared champions in the game League of Legends. With his sleek and deadly moves, Zed strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. As a champion with a rich lore and a captivating story, Zed's default skin is the embodiment of his dark and mysterious nature.

The default skin for Zed is the one that players start with when they first unlock him. It showcases Zed's signature look, featuring a black and red color scheme that perfectly represents his affiliation with the Order of the Shadow. The skin highlights Zed's deadly and agile nature, with his flowing robes and intricate armor design.

Zed's default skin perfectly captures his essence as the Master of Shadows. The black and red color palette symbolizes his connection to darkness and his mastery over shadows. The intricate armor design showcases his status as a skilled and powerful assassin. The flowing robes add a touch of elegance to his appearance, while also allowing for swift and fluid movements during combat.

Zed's default skin also includes several unique visual effects that enhance his abilities. When Zed uses his ultimate ability, Death Mark, a shadowy figure of himself appears behind the target, adding an extra layer of intimidation. The visual effects for his other abilities, such as Razor Shuriken and Living Shadow, also reflect his mastery over shadows and add to the overall aesthetic of the skin.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and understand the significance of his default skin in the context of his lore. Zed was once a member of the Kinkou Order, an ancient organization dedicated to preserving balance and harmony in the world. However, Zed's thirst for power and his desire to unlock the secrets of shadow magic led him down a dark path.

Zed discovered a forbidden technique known as the

which granted him immense power but also corrupted his soul. He used this newfound power to overthrow the Kinkou Order and establish the Order of the Shadow, a group that embraced the darkness and sought to dominate the world. Zed became the leader of this order, and his default skin represents his transformation into the Master of Shadows.

In terms of gameplay, Zed is an assassin champion who excels at bursting down squishy targets and quickly eliminating them from the battlefield. His kit revolves around his shadows, allowing him to dash in and out of combat, confuse his enemies, and deal massive damage. Zed's default skin perfectly complements his playstyle, as it embodies his swift and deadly nature.

Zed's strengths lie in his ability to quickly assassinate targets and escape from dangerous situations. His high burst damage and mobility make him a formidable opponent in one-on-one duels. Zed's shadows also provide him with excellent outplay potential, allowing him to juke skillshots and confuse his enemies.

However, Zed also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, making him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage. Zed's ultimate ability, while powerful, requires precise timing and positioning to maximize its effectiveness. Additionally, Zed's reliance on energy as a resource means that he needs to manage his abilities carefully to avoid running out of energy during crucial moments.

In the world of League of Legends, Zed has become an iconic champion known for his deadly skills and captivating lore. His default skin represents his transformation into the Master of Shadows and showcases his dark and mysterious nature. Whether you're a fan of Zed's lore, his gameplay, or simply his stylish appearance, his default skin is a must-have for any Zed enthusiast.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Zed's appearances, including his skins and alternate versions. Explore the different facets of Zed's character and immerse yourself in the world of the Master of Shadows.

Zed (Empyrean Zed)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 20, 2020

Zed, the Master of Shadows, is one of the most iconic and feared champions in the League of Legends. With his swift and deadly abilities, he strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. As a champion with a rich lore and a strong presence in the game, Zed has received numerous skins over the years, each offering a unique visual and thematic experience. One such skin is

which was released on November 20, 2020, and is available for 1350 RP.

Empyrean Zed is a skin that takes Zed's dark and mysterious persona to a whole new level. Inspired by celestial beings and the vastness of the cosmos, this skin transforms Zed into a cosmic entity, radiating power and otherworldly energy. The skin features a stunning color palette of deep blues, purples, and blacks, with intricate cosmic patterns adorning Zed's armor and weapons. The effects of his abilities are also modified to match the cosmic theme, leaving a trail of stardust and cosmic energy in his wake.

One of the standout features of Empyrean Zed is the unique recall animation. When Zed recalls, he is enveloped in a swirling vortex of cosmic energy, transporting him to a different plane of existence before returning to the battlefield. This recall animation perfectly captures the otherworldly nature of the skin and adds an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zed, originally known as Shen's apprentice, was consumed by his desire for power and knowledge. He delved into forbidden arts, ultimately leading to a confrontation with his master. In a battle that would forever change their lives, Zed defeated Shen and claimed the forbidden techniques of the Order of Shadows for himself. With this newfound power, Zed formed the Order of the Shadow, a group of assassins who embraced darkness and sought to reshape the world in their image.

Zed's strengths lie in his ability to swiftly eliminate his targets and escape unscathed. His shadows grant him unparalleled mobility and allow him to outmaneuver his opponents. With his ultimate ability, Death Mark, Zed can mark an enemy champion and unleash a flurry of attacks, dealing massive damage and potentially securing a kill. However, Zed's reliance on energy and his squishy nature make him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage. Skilled opponents can exploit his weaknesses and shut him down before he can make a significant impact in team fights.

In the game, Zed is primarily played in the mid lane as an assassin. His high burst damage and ability to roam make him a formidable threat in the early and mid-game. However, as the game progresses and team fights become more frequent, Zed's effectiveness can diminish if he falls behind or fails to snowball his advantage. Proper positioning and timing are crucial for Zed players to maximize their impact and secure kills without sacrificing their own safety.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Zed's appearances, including his base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to explore the cosmic realm with Empyrean Zed, there is a skin to suit every taste. So, embrace the shadows, harness the power of the cosmos, and unleash your inner assassin with Zed and his Empyrean skin!

Zed (Shockblade Zed)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: August 13, 2013

Shockblade Zed is a legendary skin for the champion Zed in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on August 13, 2013, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. With its sleek and electrifying design, Shockblade Zed offers players a visually stunning and immersive experience.

The Shockblade Zed skin transforms the already formidable Zed into a fearsome warrior with a futuristic twist. The skin features a black and blue color scheme, with glowing blue accents that pulsate with energy. Zed's signature shadow clones are also given a new look, appearing as electrified duplicates that add to the skin's overall theme.

One of the standout features of Shockblade Zed is the unique particle effects it brings to Zed's abilities. Each ability now emits a vibrant blue energy, enhancing the visual impact of Zed's deadly strikes. The shurikens he throws, the shadows he creates, and the explosions from his ultimate ability all receive a stunning makeover, making Shockblade Zed a skin that truly stands out on the battlefield.

Furthermore, Shockblade Zed also includes new sound effects that complement the skin's futuristic aesthetic. The sound of crackling electricity accompanies Zed's every move, adding an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience. These audio enhancements further contribute to the overall appeal of the skin, making it a must-have for Zed enthusiasts and collectors alike.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zed, also known as the Master of Shadows, is a highly skilled assassin hailing from the Ionian province of Ionia. Trained in the ancient and secretive art of shadow magic, Zed seeks to perfect his skills and gain ultimate power.

Zed's story is one of tragedy and revenge. Once a student of the Kinkou Order, an organization dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony in Ionia, Zed became disillusioned with their teachings. He believed that the Kinkou Order's strict adherence to neutrality hindered their ability to protect Ionia effectively.

Driven by his desire for power and his thirst for revenge against those who wronged him, Zed formed the Order of the Shadow. This secret society embraced the forbidden techniques of shadow magic, which the Kinkou Order had deemed too dangerous to wield. With his newfound power, Zed seeks to reshape Ionia in his own image, regardless of the consequences.

In the game, Zed is a high-risk, high-reward champion who excels at burst damage and assassination. His kit revolves around his shadows, allowing him to dash in and out of combat while confusing his enemies. Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, is particularly devastating, as it marks an enemy champion and deals massive damage after a short delay.

However, Zed's strength comes at a price. He is a squishy champion with low health, making him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage. Additionally, Zed's abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness, making him a challenging champion to master.

Despite his weaknesses, Zed has become a fan-favorite champion due to his high skill ceiling and flashy playstyle. His ability to outplay opponents with his shadows and execute swift assassinations has made him a staple pick in both casual and professional play. Zed's popularity has also led to the creation of numerous skins, each offering a unique visual and thematic twist to the champion.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Zed's appearances, including the legendary Shockblade Zed skin. Whether you're a Zed main looking to add another skin to your collection or a curious player wanting to learn more about this iconic champion, this page is your go-to resource for all things Zed.

Zed (Death Sworn Zed)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 26, 2017

Death Sworn Zed is a skin for the popular League of Legends champion, Zed. Released on October 26, 2017, this skin is part of the Death Sworn skin line, which features dark and haunting appearances for various champions. With its eerie and menacing design, Death Sworn Zed offers players a unique and sinister look for their favorite ninja assassin.

The Death Sworn Zed skin transforms the already formidable Zed into a terrifying specter of death. Clad in dark, tattered robes and adorned with glowing, ethereal markings, Zed becomes an embodiment of the underworld. His signature shadows are replaced with swirling black smoke, adding an extra layer of mystique to his abilities. The skin also features new spell effects, animations, and sound effects, all of which contribute to the skin's haunting theme.

As a legendary skin, Death Sworn Zed comes with a higher price tag of 1350 RP. However, the level of detail and the unique visual and audio effects make it a worthwhile investment for Zed enthusiasts and players looking to add a touch of darkness to their gameplay.

The Story of Zed

Zed, the Master of Shadows, is a champion in League of Legends known for his high burst damage and assassination potential. He hails from the Ionian province of Ionia, a land steeped in tradition and spiritual energy. Zed was once a member of the Kinkou Order, an organization dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony in Ionia. However, his thirst for power and desire to unlock the secrets of the shadows led him down a darker path.

Driven by his ambition, Zed delved into forbidden techniques, ultimately discovering the forbidden art of shadow manipulation. With his newfound powers, he formed the Order of the Shadow, a group that sought to harness the power of darkness for their own purposes. Zed's actions led to a conflict with his former master, Shen, and the Kinkou Order, resulting in a bitter rivalry that continues to this day.

In the game, Zed is classified as an assassin, excelling at quickly eliminating high-priority targets. His kit revolves around his shadows, allowing him to dash in and out of combat, confuse his enemies, and deal massive burst damage. Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, marks an enemy champion and allows him to teleport to their location after a short delay, dealing additional damage based on the damage dealt during the mark's duration.

While Zed is a formidable champion, he does have his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to crowd control effects and burst damage from enemy champions. Additionally, Zed's reliance on his shadows for mobility and damage can be a double-edged sword, as a well-timed crowd control ability or displacement effect can disrupt his combos and render him ineffective.

In the lore of League of Legends, Zed's story is intertwined with other champions from Ionia, such as Shen and Akali. His actions and the conflict with the Kinkou Order have far-reaching consequences, shaping the narrative of the game's world. Zed's place in the game is that of a high-risk, high-reward champion, requiring precision and quick thinking to excel.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Zed's appearances, including the Death Sworn Zed skin. Whether you're a fan of his dark and haunting look or simply want to learn more about his gameplay, this page is your go-to resource for all things Zed.

Zed (Debonair Zed)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 20, 2014

Debonair Zed is a stylish and sophisticated skin for the champion Zed in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on November 20, 2014, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP.

The Debonair Zed skin gives a fresh and elegant look to the deadly ninja assassin. Zed, known for his dark and mysterious appearance, is transformed into a dashing gentleman with this skin. He dons a sleek black suit with a red tie, exuding charm and sophistication. His signature shadows are replaced with refined smoke, adding an extra touch of class to his abilities.

One of the standout features of the Debonair Zed skin is the attention to detail. From the perfectly tailored suit to the polished shoes, every aspect of the skin showcases the elegance and refinement of a true gentleman. The animations and effects are also modified to match the theme, making each ability cast a visually pleasing experience.

When Zed uses his Q ability, Razor Shuriken, instead of throwing shurikens, he elegantly tosses playing cards at his enemies. The cards spin through the air, leaving a trail of smoke behind them. This adds a touch of flair to his deadly attacks, making them even more captivating.

His W ability, Living Shadow, is transformed into a refined smoke that swirls around him. The smoke takes the shape of Zed's shadow, creating a mesmerizing effect. When Zed swaps places with his shadow, the smoke gracefully follows his movements, enhancing the overall aesthetic of the skin.

With his E ability, Shadow Slash, Zed unleashes a burst of refined smoke that surrounds his enemies. The smoke elegantly wraps around his targets, leaving them momentarily stunned. This ability showcases the grace and precision of Debonair Zed's attacks.

Finally, Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, is enhanced with the Debonair skin. When Zed marks his target, a burst of refined smoke envelops them, intensifying the moment of impending doom. As Zed dashes towards his target, leaving a trail of smoke behind him, the elegance and power of the skin are truly showcased.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zed, the Master of Shadows, is a highly skilled ninja who hails from the Ionian province of Ionia. Trained in the ancient art of shadow magic, Zed seeks to perfect his skills and gain ultimate power.

Zed's past is intertwined with the Order of the Shadow, a secretive organization that once protected Ionia. However, Zed's thirst for power led him to challenge his master, Shen, in a duel. Zed emerged victorious, but his actions caused the Order to splinter, leading to a devastating civil war in Ionia.

Now an outcast, Zed formed his own organization known as the Order of the Shadow, seeking to harness the forbidden techniques of shadow magic. With his mastery over shadows, Zed became a formidable force, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

In the game, Zed is a high-damage assassin who excels at swiftly eliminating his targets. His abilities allow him to dash in and out of combat, leaving his enemies helpless. Zed's shadows grant him incredible mobility and the ability to surprise his foes from unexpected angles.

However, Zed's power comes at a cost. He is relatively squishy and lacks crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to crowd control effects and burst damage. Zed requires precise timing and positioning to maximize his damage output and escape unscathed.

Despite his weaknesses, Zed has become a fan-favorite champion due to his high skill ceiling and flashy playstyle. Skilled Zed players can outplay their opponents with their lightning-fast reflexes and strategic use of shadows.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Zed, including the Debonair Zed skin. Whether you prefer the classic dark and mysterious Zed or the refined and sophisticated Debonair Zed, there is a skin to suit your taste.

So, embrace the shadows or indulge in the elegance of Debonair Zed, and unleash your inner ninja in the world of League of Legends!

Zed (Prestige PROJECT: Zed)

RP Cost: 100 Prestige Points

Release Date: August 2021

Introducing the highly anticipated Prestige PROJECT: Zed skin, a stunning addition to the League of Legends universe. This prestigious skin is a limited edition variant of the PROJECT: Zed skin, offering a unique and exclusive look for one of the game's most iconic champions. With its sleek design and futuristic aesthetic, Prestige PROJECT: Zed is a must-have for any Zed enthusiast.

As a Prestige skin, this variant is only available for a limited time and can be obtained by exchanging 100 Prestige Points. These points can be earned through various in-game events or by purchasing them directly from the League of Legends store. The exclusivity and rarity of this skin make it a highly sought-after collectible for dedicated Zed players.

Prestige PROJECT: Zed features a striking color scheme, with a predominantly black and gold design. The skin incorporates intricate details and glowing accents, giving Zed a more futuristic and high-tech appearance. The particles and effects have also been enhanced, creating a visually stunning experience for players.

One of the standout features of Prestige PROJECT: Zed is the unique recall animation. When Zed recalls, he is enveloped in a holographic projection, showcasing his mastery of shadows and technology. This recall animation adds an extra layer of immersion and style to the skin, making it truly stand out from the rest.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zed, also known as the Master of Shadows, is a highly skilled assassin hailing from Ionia. Trained in the ancient art of shadow magic, Zed seeks to perfect his techniques and gain ultimate power.

Zed's past is intertwined with the Order of the Shadow, an organization that once protected Ionia but fell into corruption. Zed was once a member of the Order, but he disagreed with their methods and sought to forge his own path. In a climactic battle, Zed defeated his former master, Shen's father, and claimed the forbidden shadow techniques for himself.

Since then, Zed has become a feared and respected figure in the League of Legends universe. His abilities revolve around manipulating shadows, allowing him to teleport, strike with deadly precision, and unleash devastating bursts of damage. Zed's playstyle is characterized by his high mobility and burst potential, making him a formidable assassin in the game.

In the game, Zed is primarily played in the mid lane, where his ability to quickly eliminate squishy targets shines. His kit revolves around his shadows, which he can use to dash to enemies, create clones, and deal massive damage. Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, allows him to mark an enemy champion and then teleport to them after a short delay, dealing additional damage based on the damage dealt during the mark's duration.

While Zed excels at assassinating high-priority targets, he does have some weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustained damage, making him vulnerable in extended fights. Additionally, Zed's reliance on his shadows for mobility and damage can be exploited by opponents who can predict his movements and dodge his abilities.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos showcasing Zed's various appearances in the League of Legends universe. From his classic skin to the PROJECT line and the prestigious Prestige PROJECT: Zed, you can explore the evolution of this iconic champion's visual design.

Whether you're a fan of Zed's lore, a dedicated player looking to master his gameplay, or simply interested in the stunning visuals of his skins, this page is your go-to resource for all things Zed. Immerse yourself in the world of shadows and experience the thrill of playing as the Master of Shadows himself.

Zed (Galaxy Slayer Zed)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 7, 2019

Galaxy Slayer Zed is a legendary skin for the champion Zed in the popular online game League of Legends. Released on March 7, 2019, this skin offers a stunning visual upgrade to Zed, transforming him into a fearsome cosmic warrior. With its unique design and effects, Galaxy Slayer Zed has quickly become a favorite among players.

The skin features Zed adorned in sleek, futuristic armor, complete with glowing blue accents and intricate details. His signature shadow clones are transformed into ethereal projections, emanating a cosmic energy that adds to the skin's otherworldly aesthetic. The abilities of Galaxy Slayer Zed are also enhanced with stunning visual effects, making each ability cast a spectacle to behold.

One of the standout features of Galaxy Slayer Zed is the skin's recall animation. When Zed recalls, he is enveloped in a swirling vortex of cosmic energy, teleporting him back to base in a flash of light. This recall animation perfectly captures the essence of the skin, showcasing Zed's mastery over the celestial forces.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and how he came to possess the Galaxy Slayer Zed skin. Zed, also known as the Master of Shadows, is a deadly assassin hailing from the Ionian province of Ionia. Trained in the ancient art of shadow magic, Zed seeks to avenge his fallen master, Shen's father, by eliminating those responsible for his death.

Zed's journey takes a cosmic turn when he discovers a hidden temple deep within the mountains of Ionia. Inside the temple, he uncovers a powerful artifact known as the Galaxy Stone. This stone grants Zed unimaginable power, allowing him to tap into the cosmic energies of the universe. With this newfound power, Zed becomes the Galaxy Slayer, a force to be reckoned with.

In the game, Zed is a high-risk, high-reward champion who excels at burst damage and assassination. His kit revolves around his shadows, allowing him to dash in and out of combat, confuse his enemies, and deal devastating damage. Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, marks an enemy champion and allows him to teleport to their location after a short delay, dealing massive damage in the process.

However, Zed's power comes at a price. He is a squishy champion, meaning he has low health and is vulnerable to crowd control effects. Additionally, Zed's abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness. Players must carefully manage their shadows and make split-second decisions to outplay their opponents.

Zed's story within the League of Legends universe is intertwined with other champions, most notably Shen, his former ally turned rival. The conflict between Zed and Shen represents the clash between light and shadow, order and chaos. Their ongoing feud adds depth and intrigue to the lore of the game, captivating players and fueling their desire to master Zed's abilities.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Zed's appearances, including the Galaxy Slayer Zed skin. Whether you're a fan of Zed's lore, a dedicated player looking to improve your skills, or simply appreciate the stunning visuals of the Galaxy Slayer Zed skin, this page has something for everyone.

Zed (PROJECT: Zed)

RP: 1350 | Release Date: August 1, 2015

The PROJECT: Zed skin is a futuristic and cybernetic-themed costume for the champion Zed in the popular online game League of Legends. Released on August 1, 2015, this skin is part of the PROJECT skin line, which features champions transformed into high-tech, augmented versions of themselves. With its sleek design and unique visual effects, PROJECT: Zed offers players a thrilling and immersive experience as they embody this deadly assassin in a dystopian future.

PROJECT: Zed - A Closer Look

PROJECT: Zed presents a striking visual overhaul for the champion, transforming him into a cybernetic ninja. The skin features a sleek black and silver color scheme, with glowing blue accents that highlight his robotic enhancements. Zed's traditional ninja garb is replaced with a futuristic armor, complete with angular plates and glowing circuitry. His iconic shadow clones are now holographic projections, adding an extra layer of technological flair to his abilities.

The abilities of Zed are also given a futuristic twist with the PROJECT: Zed skin. His shurikens are transformed into razor-sharp energy blades, leaving a trail of neon blue particles as they slice through the air. The Living Shadow ability, which allows Zed to create a clone of himself, now manifests as a holographic projection, further emphasizing the cybernetic theme. Additionally, Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, is enhanced with a stunning visual effect, as he dashes towards his target leaving behind a trail of neon blue energy.

Overall, PROJECT: Zed offers players a visually stunning and immersive experience, combining the deadly prowess of Zed with the futuristic aesthetics of the PROJECT skin line.

The Story of Zed

Zed, the Master of Shadows, is a champion in League of Legends known for his agility, precision, and deadly assassination skills. Born in the secluded province of Ionia, Zed was once a student of the Kinkou Order, an ancient organization dedicated to maintaining balance and harmony. However, his thirst for power and desire to unlock forbidden techniques led him down a dark path.

After discovering a hidden scroll containing forbidden shadow magic, Zed betrayed his master, Shen, and the Kinkou Order. He formed his own order, known as the Order of the Shadow, and sought to harness the dark powers of the shadows for his own gain. Zed's actions brought chaos and turmoil to Ionia, as he waged war against the Kinkou Order and sought to claim ultimate power.

In the game, Zed is a high-damage assassin who excels at swiftly eliminating his targets. His abilities revolve around shadows and deception, allowing him to dash in and out of combat while leaving his enemies bewildered. Zed's passive ability, Contempt for the Weak, deals bonus damage to enemies below a certain health threshold, making him particularly deadly in finishing off weakened opponents. His Living Shadow ability allows him to create a clone of himself, which can be used to confuse enemies and unleash devastating combos.

However, Zed also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to crowd control effects and burst damage. Additionally, Zed's abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness, making him a high skill-cap champion that requires practice and mastery to fully utilize.

In the lore of League of Legends, Zed's story is intertwined with other champions, such as Shen and Akali, who are members of the Kinkou Order. His actions and quest for power have far-reaching consequences, shaping the narrative of the game's world and the conflicts within it.

Explore Zed's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Zed in League of Legends. From his classic skin to the PROJECT: Zed skin, each appearance offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer the traditional ninja aesthetic or the futuristic cybernetic look, Zed's appearances allow players to customize their gameplay and immerse themselves in the world of League of Legends.

So, dive into the shadows and unleash your inner assassin with Zed and his PROJECT: Zed skin. Embrace the power of technology and become the ultimate cybernetic ninja in the dystopian world of League of Legends.

Zed (Immortal Journey Zed)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: September 22, 2017

League of Legends is a game that offers a wide range of champions, each with their own unique abilities and appearances. One of the most popular champions in the game is Zed, a master of shadows and a deadly assassin. Zed has become an iconic figure in the League of Legends community, known for his high burst damage and flashy plays. To further enhance his presence, Riot Games introduced a new skin for Zed called

Released on September 22, 2017, the Immortal Journey Zed skin offers players a fresh and unique look for the champion. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin provides a visually stunning experience that immerses players into the world of Zed and his shadowy abilities.

The Immortal Journey Zed skin features a striking color palette, with a combination of deep purples, blacks, and gold accents. The design incorporates intricate details, such as ornate patterns on Zed's armor and a flowing cape that adds a sense of elegance to his appearance. The skin also introduces new visual effects, including unique animations for Zed's abilities, making them even more visually appealing and satisfying to use.

One of the standout features of the Immortal Journey Zed skin is the inclusion of new voice lines. Zed's voice actor delivers a commanding performance, capturing the essence of the champion's dark and mysterious nature. The new voice lines add depth to Zed's character, further immersing players into the world of the game.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zed, originally known as Shen's apprentice, was consumed by his desire for power and knowledge of the forbidden arts. He delved into the shadows, seeking mastery over the dark arts of the Order of the Shadow. However, his actions led to a rift between him and Shen, resulting in a bitter rivalry.

Zed's abilities revolve around his mastery of shadows. His passive ability, Contempt for the Weak, allows him to deal bonus damage to enemies below a certain health threshold. His Q ability, Razor Shuriken, sends out a shuriken that damages enemies in its path. Zed's W ability, Living Shadow, allows him to create a shadow clone that mimics his abilities, providing him with increased mobility and damage potential. His E ability, Shadow Slash, damages enemies in an area around him, slowing them in the process. Finally, Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, allows him to dash to a target enemy champion, dealing massive damage and marking them. After a short delay, the mark detonates, dealing additional damage based on the damage dealt during the mark's duration.

Zed's strengths lie in his burst damage and mobility. With his ability to quickly dash in and out of fights, he excels at assassinating high-priority targets and escaping unfavorable situations. His shadows provide him with additional options for outplaying opponents, making him a formidable force in the hands of a skilled player.

However, Zed also has weaknesses that can be exploited by his opponents. He is relatively squishy and lacks sustain, making him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage. Additionally, Zed's ultimate ability leaves him vulnerable during the mark's delay, giving opponents an opportunity to retaliate and potentially turn the tide of the fight.

In the world of League of Legends, Zed has become an iconic figure, known for his flashy plays and high skill ceiling. He is a champion that rewards players who invest time and effort into mastering his abilities. With his unique playstyle and visually striking appearance, Zed has captured the hearts of many players and has become a staple pick in both casual and competitive play.

Zed (SKT T1 Zed)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: May 5, 2015

SKT T1 Zed is a legendary skin for the champion Zed in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on May 5, 2015, and is part of the SKT T1 skin line, which celebrates the victories of the Korean professional team SK Telecom T1 in the League of Legends World Championships.

As a legendary skin, SKT T1 Zed offers a complete visual and audio overhaul for the champion, transforming him into a member of the SK Telecom T1 team. The skin features new animations, sound effects, and voice lines, all designed to immerse players in the world of professional League of Legends.

SKT T1 Zed showcases Zed wearing the iconic black and red uniform of SK Telecom T1. His abilities are also modified to match the theme of the skin. For example, his shurikens are replaced with miniature versions of the SK Telecom T1 logo, and his shadows take on the appearance of the team's logo as well. The skin also includes unique recall animations and a special death animation, adding even more flair to Zed's gameplay.

Now, let's delve into the story of Zed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Zed, also known as the Master of Shadows, is a highly skilled assassin hailing from the Ionian province of Ionia. Trained in the ancient and forbidden art of shadow magic, Zed seeks to perfect his skills and gain ultimate power.

Zed's story is intertwined with that of his former master, Shen, and the secretive order known as the Kinkou. Once a member of the Kinkou, Zed's thirst for power led him down a dark path, causing him to betray his comrades and embrace the forbidden shadow arts. This act led to a confrontation with Shen, resulting in Zed's exile from the Kinkou and the birth of a bitter rivalry between the two.

In the game, Zed is a high-risk, high-reward champion who excels at burst damage and assassination. His kit revolves around his shadows, which he can use to dash around the battlefield, confuse his enemies, and unleash devastating attacks. Zed's ultimate ability, Death Mark, allows him to mark an enemy champion and then teleport to their location after a short delay, dealing massive damage in the process.

However, Zed's power comes at a price. He is a squishy champion with low health and limited crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage from enemy champions. Zed requires precise timing and positioning to maximize his damage output while avoiding being caught out of position.

In the competitive scene, Zed has seen his fair share of play, especially during the height of his popularity in Season 3 and 4. His high skill ceiling and flashy plays made him a favorite pick among professional players, showcasing their mechanical prowess and ability to outplay opponents. SK Telecom T1, the team that inspired the SKT T1 Zed skin, has also utilized Zed in their strategies, with Faker, their star mid laner, famously showcasing his Zed skills in multiple World Championships.

Overall, Zed is a champion that embodies the thrill of high-risk, high-reward gameplay. With his SKT T1 Zed skin, players can not only experience the excitement of playing as this powerful assassin but also pay homage to the legendary SK Telecom T1 team. Whether you're a fan of Zed's lore, his gameplay, or simply want to show off your love for SK Telecom T1, the SKT T1 Zed skin is a must-have for any Zed enthusiast.

For more information about Zed and his various appearances, including the SKT T1 Zed skin, be sure to check out the League of Legends official website and the champion spotlight videos available on YouTube.
